DOC.detailed_description: Child behavioral concern common among family serve The Children 's Hospital Philadelphia ( CHOP ) urban primary care center . To address , develop Child Adult Relationship Enhancement Model Primary Care Parenting Program ( PriCARE ) , scale version Parent Child Interaction Therapy design urban primary care clinic . The objective study 1 ) evaluate efficacy modify PriCARE decrease child behavior problem improve parent capacity skill 2 ) understand parent ' perception efficacy PriCARE strategy improve implementation dissemination . We perform randomize control trial ( RCT ) effectiveness modify PriCARE decrease child behavior problem improve positive parenting among 2- 6-year-old child behavior problem parent CHOP 's South Philadelphia Primary Care Center Karabots Pediatric Care Center . We intend randomize 120 child-parent pair ( 240 subject ) receive PriCARE immediately plus usual treatment ( intervention group ) 60 child-parent pair ( 120 subject ) receive PriCARE later time plus usual treatment ( control group ) total 180 child-parent pair ( 360 subject ) . All child-parent pair randomize control group place waitlist offer PriCARE completion data collection . Child behavior parent style measure baseline ( time 1 ) , 6-19 week ( time 2 ) , 14-27 week ( time 3 ) .
